title: Bijou Deli Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Take-out, British, Catering, Welsh, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Licensed cafe in a quirky little building, cozy in the winter with a log burner and has a courtyard garden for warm days and evenings. Makes food onsite with menu items are vegetarian except for fish. Has vegan wine and cider. Offers afternoon tea. Opens occasionally in the evening and for private parties.
